basics.description: **Note:** Please refer to the following before installing the solution: • Review the solution [Release Notes](https://github.com/Azure/Azure-Sentinel/tree/master/Solutions/ReversingLabs/ReleaseNotes.md) • There may be [known issues](https://aka.ms/sentinelsolutionsknownissues) pertaining to this Solution, please refer to them before installing. The ReversingLabs Content Pack solution for Microsoft Sentinel includes a number of Microsoft Sentinel resources designed to automate your security operations using the power of Spectra Intelligence (formerly TitaniumCloud) and Spectra Analyze (formerly A1000) APIs. **Workbooks:** 1, **Playbooks:** 5 [Learn more about Microsoft Sentinel](https://aka.ms/azuresentinel) | [Learn more about Solutions](https://aka.ms/azuresentinelsolutionsdoc)

options.text: This Microsoft Sentinel Solution installs workbooks. Workbooks provide a flexible canvas for data monitoring, analysis, and the creation of rich visual reports within the Azure portal. They allow you to tap into one or many data sources from Microsoft Sentinel and combine them into unified interactive experiences.
The ReversingLabs-CapabilitiesOverview workbook provides a high level look at your threat intelligence capabilities and how they relate to your operations.
This solution installs the following Playbook templates. After installing the solution, playbooks can be managed in the Manage solution view.
